import React, { Fragment, useState, useRef } from "react"; import "./styles.css"; import { Button, Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, FormGroup, Label, Input, Form, Progress, Container } from 'reactstrap'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import _ from "lodash"; const CreateNewCourseOverviewReview = ({ overallProgress, setOverallProgress, setProgress, courseData, userData }) => { console.log("CreateNewCourseOverviewReview courseData - : ", courseData); return (

{overallProgress}% Complete

Course information review & submission

You will now need to review all of your information to make sure all data is correct before proceeding to post your course for sale. If you need to change any data, simply click the "edit" icon and you will be redirected back to the appropriate page while saving all of your data so you can edit just that single data point...
); } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { userData: state.auth.data, courseData: _.has(state.courseData, "courseData") ? state.courseData.courseData : null } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { })(CreateNewCourseOverviewReview);
